channel.title: Music Review Podcast
channel.description: MusicReviewPodcast.com's top critic Steve brings you all the latest and incoming music reviews. Steve's honest and hard hitting reviews will leave you in no doubt what's to buy and what's to dump. Features a round up of the latest industry news.
channel.itunes:summary: MusicReviewPodcast.com's top critic Steve brings you all the latest and incoming music reviews. Steve's honest and hard hitting reviews will leave you in no doubt what's to buy and what's to dump. Features a round up of the latest industry news.
channel.itunes:subtitle: MusicReviewPodcast.com - The latest music reviews and music news
channel.itunes:author: MusicReviewPodcast.com

item.title: #5 June 2010
item.itunes:subtitle: A rundown of the finest offerings from June 2010 and a very informative feature on surviving a Summer music festival.
item.itunes:summary: A rundown of the finest offerings from June 2010 and a very informative feature on surviving a Summer music festival.
item.description: A rundown of the finest offerings from June 2010 and a very informative feature on surviving a Summer music festival.

item.title: #4 April 2010
item.itunes:subtitle: A rundown of the finest offerings from March 2010 including forthcoming releases from lesser known bands and an amazing feature on the German electro pioneers Kraftwerk

item.title: #3 February 2010
item.itunes:subtitle: A rundown of the finest offerings from mid January to early February 2010 aswell as a fabulous feature on the 2010 Brit Awards with all the categories, nominations and our predictions for the winners

item.title: #1 Introduction Podcast
item.itunes:subtitle: This is a brief introduction to explain how the podcast will work and what it will consist of.
item.itunes:summary: This is a brief introduction to explain how the podcast will work and what it will consist of. Coming soon, a Top 10 rundown of Albums and Singles from 2009 and a fabulous feature looking back at the career of Jarvis Cocker and Pulp.
